author: Paul Cullen, Jennifer Bray
title: Ireland may endure repeated waves of Covid-19 epidemics
description: Analysis suggests that, at best, there may be three more infection cycles before possible herd immunity occurs
content:
Ireland may have to cope with repeated waves of Covid-19 epidemics until a large enough proportion of the population is infected to provide possible herd immunity, new research warns.
At best, there may be three more cycles of infection before 60 per cent of… [+5159 chars]
